entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 12 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
